Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace one of the swann cameras I have that came with a dvr package. I wanted one like this because it's white, small, and has a much wider angle. The wide angle was important to me. I mounted this on the roof of my front porch and I can see everything now. With the old camera I could only see about half. I already had the wires run and hole drilled for the camera, so switching out my old ones for this was simple. The plugs are standard bnc and normal power cable. The picture quality on these is better than the ones I had but not by much. I don't really blame the camera though since it's probably the DVR that's the bottle neck now. I'll be ordering more.Edit: I just got a second one in and installed it. No real difference in performance compared to the other one. Everything is ok with it. However I have noticed the night operation isn't the best. My first one is under an always lit porch and is good, the second on the driveway which is very dark at night. If it is pointing to a pitch black area, you get some of the IR/lens reflection going on and night vision is maybe 20 ft at best. This isn't a deal breaker for me but if you need night vision in general with a security camera system, look in to motion sensor lights or IR flood lights. For security, motion sensor lights would be good to have anyways. There are solar powered ones if you don't want to run wires.

Reviews.Title: 24ir 700tvl dome
Reviews.Author: donald treull
Reviews.Content: Not  all that good of a camera. It said weather proof ,well I don't think so .Water is already in the lens . Works great in dry weather,just not when it is raining

Reviews.Title: Love these cameras
Reviews.Author: Chip
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great for your home or office.  I install security systems for a living.  When on a budget, but still want a good quality picture, this is your go to camera.  700TVL, good infrared, good viewing area.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cameras
Reviews.Author: Ryan Peterson
Reviews.Content: Excellent Cameras. I used these to replace Zmodo cameras that came with a system that I bought. Although these are the same TVL ( 700 ) as the bullet cameras that I had, there is a huge difference in picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chad Suttles
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture and great ir quality. I love being able to lock the camera down due to hard to get to high mounting. Set it and forget it.

Reviews.Title: Great prodcut for little money.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Great picture and IR output for a cheap camera just to see if someone is in an area. You wouldnt be able to identify the person in court but its working great for what i needed.

Reviews.Title: GOOD QUALITY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Provides a very good picture for the price.  I have installed 4 of these and I am very happy.  Greatly improved picture quality over the standard cameras provided with basic video systems.

Reviews.Title: No power supply as advertised
Reviews.Author: Norman Paperman "NWhippie"
Reviews.Content: Cameras (I ordered two) did not arrive with power supply as advertised. I had to order a separate power supply and when it finally arrived, I found that 1 of the cameras had defective IR LED's. Had to return. Other camera has nice color and good night time vision. The only drawback, and maybe this is normal for these types of cameras, is the camera makes a very audible click sound when switching from day to night mode and back. Could draw attention to it if in the right situation.
